channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-37610] Running Over agg without OrderBy throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
item.description:
SQL query:

|SELECT c,
|    COUNT(a) OVER (PARTITION BY c) AS cnt1 -- ORDER BY is not specified
|FROM MyTable

Exception:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 0 out of bounds for length 0
	at com.google.common.collect.RegularImmutableList.get(RegularImmutableList.java:81)	at status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
